# Copilot Instructions

> **Note**: General repository guidelines (project structure, coding standards, testing, commits) are documented in [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md).

## Platform Paths

Reference paths for supported platforms:

- Claude: `~/.claude/`
- VS Code: `~/.config/Code/User/prompts/` (Linux)
- Copilot: `~/.copilot/`
- Codex: `~/.config/opencode/skill/`
